sentence.Network_en: A habit of dissimulation is a hindrance , and a poorness to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他这样的一个人,一种掩饰的习惯是一种阻挠, 一个弱点.

sentence.Network_en: Still we have our limits beyond which we call dissimulation treachery.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过我们仍然有自己的限度,超过这个界限,就是虚伪与背信弃义.

sentence.Network_en: The protective instinct always nerved her to successful dissimulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 自卫的本能总能使她成功地披上伪装.
